00001 /*

00009 
00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 /*
00013         The way this should work is that we have a jcom.send object with N inlets and one outlet (dumpout)
00014         When the object receives a 'gettargets' message then it fills a menu via dumpout with all of the targets.
00015         The target is the OSC name of the target module.
00016         
00017         There is then an @target attribute, which is the jcom.in~ that this sends to.  
00018         
00019         The number of inlets are defined by an argument.  We need to check at the time that dsp is started to 
00020         make sure the target actually has the number of audio signals we are sending though...
00021         
00022         QUESTION:
00023         What about Jitter or other 'signals'?  Should they be implemented via a special mode or additions to 
00024         the plain vanilla jcom.send?
00025         
00026         Argument in that case will need to be type-checked: int = number of inputs, symbol = OSCname
00027 */
00028 
00029 typedef struct _audiosend{      
00030         t_pxobject              obj;
00031         void                    *obex;
00032         void                    *dumpout;                                               
00033 
00034         t_symbol                *attr_target;                                   
00035         t_object                *obj_target;                                    
00036         t_object                *obj_direct_target;                             
00037         
00038         long                    num_inputs;                                             
00039         float                   *audio_in[MAX_NUM_CHANNELS];    
00040 } t_audiosend;
00041 
00042 
00043 // Prototypes
00044 void    *audiosend_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00045 void    audiosend_free(t_audiosend *x);
00046 void    audiosend_assist(t_audiosend *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00047 void    audiosend_bang(t_audiosend *x);
00048 t_int*  audiosend_perform(t_int *w);
00049 void    audiosend_dsp(t_audiosend *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);
00050 t_max_err       audiosend_attr_settarget(t_audiosend *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00051 
00052 
00053 // Globals
00054 static t_class          *s_audiosend_class;                                     // Required: Global pointer for our class
00055 
00056 
00057 /************************************************************************************/
00058 
00059 int main(void)
00060 {
00061         long attrflags = 0;
00062         t_class *c;
00063         t_object *attr;
00064         
00065         jamoma_init();
00066 
00067         // Define our class
00068         c = class_new("jcom.send~", (method)audiosend_new, (method)audiosend_free, 
00069                 sizeof(t_audiosend), (method)NULL, A_GIMME, 0);
00070 
00071         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_audiosend, obex));
00072 
00073         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00074         class_addmethod(c, (method)audiosend_bang,                      "bang",                 0);
00075         class_addmethod(c, (method)audiosend_dsp,                       "dsp",                  A_CANT, 0);
00076     class_addmethod(c, (method)audiosend_assist,                "assist",               A_CANT, 0);
00077     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout",              A_CANT,0);  
00078     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref",     A_CANT, 0);
00079         
00080         // ATTRIBUTE: name
00081         attr = attr_offset_new("target", _sym_symbol, attrflags,
00082                 (method)0, (method)audiosend_attr_settarget, calcoffset(t_audiosend, attr_target));
00083         class_addattr(c, attr);
00084 
00085 
00086         // Setup our class to work with MSP
00087         class_dspinit(c);
00088         
00089         // Finalize our class
00090         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00091         s_audiosend_class = c;
00092         
00093         return 0;
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 /************************************************************************************/
00098 // Object Life
00099 
00100 // Create
00101 void *audiosend_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00102 {
00103         long                    attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);               // support normal arguments
00104         t_audiosend     *x = (t_audiosend *)object_alloc(s_audiosend_class);
00105         short                   i;
00106         
00107         if(x){
00108                 x->dumpout = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00109                 object_obex_store(x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object *)x->dumpout);
00110 
00111                 x->attr_target = _sym_nothing;
00112                 x->num_inputs = 2;              // TODO: make this dynamic from args
00113 
00114                 for(i=0; i<attrstart; i++){
00115                         if(argv[i].a_type == A_LONG)
00116                                 x->num_inputs = atom_getlong(argv+i);
00117                         else if(argv[i].a_type == A_SYM)
00118                                 x->attr_target = atom_getsym(argv+i);
00119                 }
00120                 
00121                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, x->num_inputs);
00122                 x->obj.z_misc = Z_NO_INPLACE;
00123                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                                       // handle attribute args
00124         }
00125         return x;
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 void audiosend_free(t_audiosend *x)
00130 {
00131         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 /************************************************************************************/
00136 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00137 
00138 // Method for Assistance Messages
00139 void audiosend_assist(t_audiosend *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00140 {
00141         if(msg==1)                      // Inlets
00142                 strcpy(dst, "input to send to a named module");
00143         else if(msg==2)         // Outlets
00144                 strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00145 }
00146 
00147 
00148 void audiosend_bang(t_audiosend *x)
00149 {
00150         t_atom          a[2];
00151         t_symbol        **moduleNames = NULL;
00152         long            numModules = 0;
00153         long            i;
00154 
00155         jamoma_get_all_module_names(&numModules, &moduleNames);
00156 
00157         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00158         outlet_anything(x->dumpout, gensym("menu"), 1, a);
00159         
00160         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00161         for(i=0; i<numModules; i++){
00162                 atom_setsym(a+1, moduleNames[i]);
00163                 outlet_anything(x->dumpout, gensym("menu"), 2, a);
00164         }
00165         if(moduleNames)
00166                 sysmem_freeptr(moduleNames);
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 t_int* audiosend_perform(t_int *w)
00171 {
00172         t_audiosend     *x = (t_audiosend*)(w[1]);
00173         
00174         object_method(x->obj_direct_target, gensym("remoteaudio"), x->audio_in, (long)(w[2]));
00175         return(w+3);
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 void audiosend_dsp(t_audiosend *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00180 {
00181         long            numInputs = x->num_inputs;
00182         short           i, j;
00183         t_object        *hub;
00184         
00185         if(x->attr_target && x->attr_target != _sym_nothing){
00186                 hub = jamoma_get_hub_for_module_named(x->attr_target);
00187                 if(hub != x->obj_target){
00188                         if(hub){
00189                                 x->obj_target = hub;
00190                                 // we could attach to the hub here to listen for free notifications
00191                                 // but freeing it will restart the dsp anyway, so I don't think there is any need [tap]
00192                                 x->obj_direct_target = (t_object*)object_method(hub, gensym("getobj_audioin"));
00193                         }
00194                 }
00195                 if(x->obj_target){
00196                         for(i=0, j=0; i<numInputs; i++){
00197                                 if(count[i])
00198                                         j=i;
00199                                 x->audio_in[i] = sp[i]->s_vec;
00200                         }
00201                         numInputs = j+1;
00202 
00203                         dsp_add(audiosend_perform, 2, x, numInputs);
00204                 }
00205         }
00206 }
00207 
00208 
00209 /************************************************************************************/
00210 
00211 t_max_err audiosend_attr_settarget(t_audiosend *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00212 {
00213         t_object        *hub;
00214 
00215         x->attr_target = atom_getsym(argv);
00216         hub = jamoma_get_hub_for_module_named(x->attr_target);
00217         if(hub){
00218                 x->obj_target = hub;
00219                 x->obj_direct_target = (t_object*)object_method(hub, gensym("getobj_audioin"));
00220         }
00221         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00222 }
